headerData.title: Join Us & Springboard Your Career to New Heights
headerData.description: At SSN Group we firmly believe that employees are the intellectual and building assets of the organization. With attractive compensation packages, positive and productive work environments and challenging assignments to offer, SSN Group is committed to being the employer of choice.SSN Group is committed to not only attracting and hiring the top talent in the industry but to developing and maintaining long-term employment relationships as well.

jobDescription: Implement real time systems for Algo Trading platform, OMS (order management system), Order routing, Trade execution, changing Stop Loss for active orders.
Implement API's to download market data feeds in index value protocol.
Contributes to the development, delivery and maintenance of technology based solutions.
Implement API's to download market data feeds in index value protocol.
keyActivities: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Management, Engineering(any),Technology, Information Systems or related and 5 years of exp. to design, development & support of software components that enhance or extend the reach of our client software development initiatives

jobDescription: To design, deploy, implement & support software components.
Configure, troubleshoot & resolve WebLogic, Apache issues.

Support web centric products, deploy & maintain apps as well as release specific patches, using latest tools and technologies including administration of cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Oracle, MSSQL server as backend.
Coordinate with operation teams for software upgrades.
keyActivities: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering (any),Technology or related and 5 yrs of exp. to design, deploy, implement & support software components

jobDescription: To assist in developing system requirements and producing design specifications for new technology applications or changes to existing applications.
Analyze the client needs and provide time estimation with a good project plan.
Liaison between the business units, technology and support teams.
Analyze impact of proposed solution across the organization and develop use cases that explain/ demonstrate business requirements/specifications to develop the team.
Structures and leads the user acceptance test effort to ensure that products created match business specifications.
keyActivities: Master’s degree in Business Administration, Engineering(any), Computer Science, Technology or related and 1 year of experience

jobDescription: Design, deploy, implement & support software components
Configure, troubleshoot & resolve WebLogic, Apache issues.

Support web centric products, deploy & maintain apps as well as release specific patches, using latest tools and technologies including administration of cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Oracle, MSSQL server as backend
Coordinate with operation teams for software upgrades
Experience with tools like Docker, Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Packer, CloudFormation, Terraform is preferred.
keyActivities: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer information systems, information technology, relevant engineering (computer engineering, software engineering, electronic engineering, or related), or a combination of education and experience equating to the U.S. equivalent of a Bachelor’s degree in one of the aforementioned subjects and 5 years of related experience.

jobDescription: To perform software installations and upgrades to JAVA, J2EE application servers running on different operating systems (LINUX, UNIX and Windows)
Supports the J2EE application servers  weblogic, jboss and Oracle Application server (OAS)
Involve in the analysis, design, coding and testing of user requirements in different sprints
Develop UI with AJAX, DHTML and JavaScript for more interactive web pages.
Working knowledge in Messaging (JMS, MQ, WebSphere Message Broker/Integration Bus)
keyActivities: Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering (any),Technology or related and 1 yr of experience.

jobDescription: Script test cases for automation testing
Execute test cases and validate backend processes
Retest bugs discovered during execution
Develop the automation scripts for the online applications
Develop and execute SQL queries in Oracle for backend testing Involved in Black box testing, manual testing and Regression testing of Client Server applications
Plan, execute and report testing activities
Document software defects using a bug tracking system, and report defects to software developers
Identify, analyze, and document problems with program function, output, online screen, or content
Develop testing programs that address areas such as database impacts, software scenarios, regression testing, negative testing, error or bug retests, or usability
Test system modifications to prepare for implementation. Involved in SAO applications testing, SOAP user interface testing using Selenium and Ruby.
keyActivities: MS in Engineering, computer science or related/equivalent + 2 years experience (or BS + 5 yrs experience)

jobDescription: Architect solutions for integrating dissimilar systems.
Design and document technical solutions for business requirements
Provide consultation in all software development life cycle phases of projects in Oracle modules using Object-Oriented Analysis and Design with UML

Analyze user requirements, procedures, and problems to automate or improve existing systems and review computer system capabilities, workflow, and scheduling limitations Provide technical support in performance testing of systems
Develop, document and revise system design procedures, test procedures, and quality standards
Confer with clients regarding the nature of the information processing or computation needs a computer program is to address
Coordinate with different application teams for integration of the current solution
Provide technical assistance to team and evaluate all codes
Analyze user requirements, procedures, and problems to automate systems
Understand the existing process and conduct impact analysis of the code.
keyActivities: MS – Engineering or related/equiv. + 2 yrs experience (or BS + 5 yrs experience)
